column1: #Text=Bumi says : " Ugh , I ca n't figure this thing out . "
#Text=Korra says : " Do you think being in the Spirit World during Harmonic Convergence could have given him bending ? "
#Text=Ikki says : " Maybe Uncle Bumi is just a late bloomer . "
#Text=Kya says : " I have been noticing a change in your aura lately . "
#Text=Bumi says : " And you did n't tell me ? "
#Text=Tenzin says : " Lin , you wo n't believe this .
#Text=" Mako says : " I got a call last night .
#Text=About a guy who just started airbending out of nowhere .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You mean there 's another one ?
#Text=" Mako says : " He ... blew a door down on me and got away .
#Text=We got an all - points bulletin out on him right now .
#Text=" Korra says : " Wait , we 'll help you look for him .
#Text=" Mako says : " Oh , well , y' know , you should leave it with the police .
#Text=You know , you 're welcome to stay here instead of sleeping at the police station .
#Text=" Korra says : " This is so exciting !
#Text=I bet we can find that guy before Mako does .
#Text=You know I 'm not very good at this .
#Text=" Asami says : " You 're the Avatar , master of all the elements .
#Text=" Korra says : " How long do you think talking to Mako is gon na be like pulling teeth ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Well , Mako has never been the most ... " in touch with his feelings " guy , but it 'll get better eventually .
#Text=" Korra says : " So , when I was gone , did he tell you that we broke up ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Yeah ... we all knew .
#Text=" Asami says : " Actually , I need to tell you something about that , and I should have told you this sooner , but ... while you were gone ... I ... kind of ... kissed him .
#Text=" Korra says : " No wonder he 's so nervous around us !
#Text=I mean , I kissed Mako when he was going out with you , so ... " Asami says : " You what ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , whatever happened with Mako , I 'm glad it has n't come between us .
#Text=I 've never had a girlfriend to hang out with and talk to before , except for Naga .
#Text=" Korra says : " What are you doing living in the middle of the road in the first place ?!
#Text=" Fruithog Spirit says : " Do n't ask me , Avatar !
#Text=You made the world this way ; we 're just living in it !
#Text=" Korra says : " Look , I do n't have anything against spirits , but these vines are causing major problems all over the city !
#Text=Seems like the Avatar would know that .
#Text=" Korra says : " I think that spirit just gave me an idea how to get rid of these vines ... But I 'm gon na need a lot of water .
